summary: All three requested frontend requirements appear implemented: a new /contact route with both phone numbers as tel: links, header navigation updated to route to /contact on both desktop and mobile, and footer “Connect With Us” updated to show both numbers as tel: links. Some additional, non-requested UI/content enhancements were also introduced (e.g., office hours/extra contact info on the Contact page, and broader styling/config changes per the file summaries).

hallucinated_features.description: Expanded Contact page content beyond phone numbers (e.g., “Office Hours” card and additional contact/visit information).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 only asks to create the /contact page and clearly render the two phone numbers as clickable tel: links; extra sections are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Global design-system/styling changes (updated global CSS and Tailwind configuration with new tokens/shadows/typography).
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest focuses on adding a Contact page/route and updating header/footer contact navigation; it does not request broader styling or Tailwind/theme changes.
